(/ˈzaɪlɪŋks/ ZY-links) bụ ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ na semiconductor nke America nke na-enye ngwaọrụ arụmụka a na-eme atụmatụ
Amara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ maka imepụta ụzọ ụzọ ámá ga-emepe emepe nke mbụ (FPGA) na ịmepụta ụdị nrụpụta mbụ na-enweghị isi.

Ross Freeman, Bernard Vonderschmitt, na James V Barnett II guzobere Xilinx na 1984 na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ pụtara n'ihu ọha na NASDAQ na 1990. AMD kwupụtara nnweta Xilinx na Ọktọba 2020 na nkwekọrịta ahụ mechara na February 14, 2022 site na azụmahịa ahịa niile ruru ihe ruru ijeri $50
